monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Burning Desire
skills.description: Unique Aura: Apply Shield to the party when an enemy receives Burn (Debuff) damage equal to 4% of each Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Burning Heat
skills.description: Every Fire attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Charging Shield
skills.description: Shield self for 60 when receiving a Charge stack.

skills.name: Coal Toss
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Coal Toss Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defensive Presence
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, a random Monster in the party gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Dragonskin
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Dragonskin Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Dragonskin Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Spellshield & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fire Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Fire Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heat Shimmer
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Hot to the Touch
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Burn on the attacker.

skills.name: Hybrid Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 100% of Attack and Magic value.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Lava Stream
skills.description: 7 x 75% (525%) physical damage (fire) cannot be dodged every hit has a 15% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave
skills.description: 2 x 55% (110%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Lava Wave Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Charging
skills.description: For every 40 Mana regenerated, gain a Charge stack.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Meteorite Shower
skills.description: 2 x 175% (350%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies Shield all allies for 1 x (700 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Multi Barrier
skills.description: Aura: Barrier (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Rocket Launch
skills.description: 3 x 110% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff) or Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Sheltered
skills.description: While under the effect of a Shield, reduce all incoming damage by 15%.

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Spark Shower
skills.description: 6 x 20% (120%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 30% (180%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 45% (315%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spellshield
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Utopia
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party gains 3 Charge stacks at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Volatile Shield
skills.description: Every attack consumes 50% of the current shield to do an additional hit equal to 175% of that value.

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%

drops.name: Phoenix Tear
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 4 x 200
